review: I have this and a ChromeCast. Chromecast is better for viewing media not approved by our Amazon overlords, but the remote control on the Fire stick makes it the go-to for regular watching.Prime video selection pretty much sucks, so I wouldn't factor that into a buy decision, especially if you already have a Netflix subscription.WatchESPN just seems to work better off my Android phone and thrown at the ChromeCast. In general, I want to think I notice more choppiness in video streaming overall.The remote is nice, but the UI is borderline crappy. I wish there was a way to just show my "apps" and hide all that other hoo-ha that nobody cares about. The Android versions of many of the apps just seem to be better realized than the ones on the Fire.All in all, a pretty good gadget. I'm interested in seeing how the new Dish Slinger works when it comes out.
